What's appening?

Apps4Fashion welcomes Quapi Kidswear

Apps4Fashion welcomes Quapi Kidswear. Quapi will start using our sales app for their sales team as well as our B2B web portal to service their B2B customers to see what is available on stock, to place re-orders, review order statuses, open invoices etc on a 24/7 basis. more ›

Second Female secures international growth with Apps4Fashion

Second Female secures its international growth and lifts its customer service to a higher level, by automating its sales processes with the Apps4Fashion sales representatives app and the Apps4Fashion B2B webshop.

Just Female simplifies and streamlines sales processes with Apps4Fashion

Scandinavian fashion label "Just Female" is integrating iPad and iPhone app Apps4Fashion in the company to simplify and streamline its sales processes.

Brunotti Sportswear professionalizes sales processes with Apps4Fashion

Brunotti has further digitalized its sales processes with Apps4Fashion. This gives them a major efficiency increase in order handling, while significant savings in printing costs are realized because of the digital collection book.

Sports Connection optimizes sales processes

One of the first steps in optimizing the value chain is optimizing the sales processes. And with sales tool Apps4Fashion, Sports Connection is in control.

ANNA SCOTT saves on costs and resources by digitalizing sales processes

Fashion brand ANNA SCOTT is one of the very first companies to digitalize its sales processes with iPad and iPhone app Apps4Fashion.
